item.title: Creator Caucus launches in Congress with support from Patreon, YouTube
item.description: The Congressional Creator Caucus will work to support the creator economy, which is estimated to be worth half-a-trillion dollars by 2027.

item.title: Nikola founder Trevor Milton is fighting a subpoena from his bankrupt company’s creditors
item.description: The recently-pardoned founder of Nikola, Trevor Milton, has been fighting a subpoena from the creditors of his bankrupt electric trucking company.
